[{"id":"54b5f335-47b0-46be-ba13-8b5b48c80488","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Class Documentation: ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"CallItem","styles":{"code":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"02563d8d-a65e-4fc4-934a-a88af91197cd","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"CallItem","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" class is a data container representing a specific function or method invocation. It captures all the necessary context of a call site, including where it happened, what was called, and the arguments involved. Because it implements comparison logic, it allows the analysis engine to maintain a strict chronological timeline of execution.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"8b461f6d-26c9-47f4-a86a-9d7d40136b54","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"e7bd397a-355b-465d-aa0d-856b816c02af","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":4,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Attributes","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"1d2a1cb1-00e9-4a7b-afcf-fb7034cce083","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"row","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"int","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"): The source code line number where the call expression is located.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"385a27c9-37f3-4241-b74d-7ff691faabe0","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"seq","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"int","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"): A global sequence index assigned by the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"CallManager","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":". This serves as a tie-breaker for multiple calls occurring on the same line (e.g., nested calls like ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"f(g(x))","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":").","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"f797218c-2ca4-4bad-b604-27d313058921","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"funcDefi","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"str","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"): The name or identifier of the function definition being targeted.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"2b8d5123-97e4-42a7-b1e4-cd3410956fff","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"ns","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"str","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"): The namespace (calling scope) where the call was initiated.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"13f66597-365f-4dee-9419-5d1d6e250dec","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"params","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"any","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"): The set or list of parameters passed to the function at this specific call site.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"dd115fc8-8f57-43c0-b473-58682658a48e","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"9c3c9690-e56a-4ba0-afd2-fb7465596c8e","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":4,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Methods","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"4700c872-62f4-457d-9827-e927c27da05c","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"__init__(row, seq, funcDefi, ns, params, inherit)

","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"Initializes the call record with its positional and contextual metadata.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"0eaa7ddf-4df8-48f5-95e0-51df52ca5c92","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"get_ns()

","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"Retrieves the namespace where the call originated.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"fd3c1c96-88a0-4e12-b027-896326b047f5","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"__lt__(other)

","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"The "less-than" comparison operator. It enables sorting and heap-ordering of ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"CallItem","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" objects.","styles":{}}],"children":[{"id":"956a4c9b-0623-4d7f-a13c-e100575893cd","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"A call is considered "less than" another if it occurs on an earlier ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"line number","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"row","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":").","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"85b93718-08e7-4c4f-ba64-70e2f977b62a","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"If they are on the same line, the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"sequence index","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"seq","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":") is used to determine which one was encountered first by the parser.","styles":{}}],"children":[]}]},{"id":"077d75f1-bbf4-4919-a331-70aa8996ba52","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"174e1501-7399-45e6-af6a-1ccc8829f59d","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Usage Example","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"8f642ceb-e517-44f5-8cf9-cba3f4e06c20","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"CallItem","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" objects are typically generated and managed by the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"CallManager","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" to build an execution trace.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"724e74ef-9299-48cd-a432-c04dd60e7922","type":"codeBlock","props":{"language":"python"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"from calls import CallItem

# Representing a call: login("admin") at line 10
call_a = CallItem(row=10, seq=1, funcDefi="login", ns="app.main", params=["admin"], inherit=False)

# Representing a call: validate() at line 12
call_b = CallItem(row=12, seq=2, funcDefi="validate", ns="app.main", params=[], inherit=False)

# The comparison operator allows for chronological sorting
if call_a < call_b:
    print(f"Call to {call_a.funcDefi} happens before {call_b.funcDefi}")

# Output:
# Call to login happens before validate","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"cf2650c1-d0c8-4076-b1b4-180d89e34a27","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Insights","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"6dfdf840-ed2d-4cec-bc75-91f2d76a259d","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Execution Ordering","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": The combination of ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"row","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"seq","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" in the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"__lt__","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" method is essential for high-fidelity analysis. It ensures that the engine processes data flow in the correct order, which is vital for accurately tracking variable states.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"043f755d-2f6e-47e1-b02a-18481f32a48e","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Contextual Integrity","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": By storing both the targeted function (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"funcDefi","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":") and the calling scope (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"ns","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"), the class provides the full "bridge" required for inter-procedural analysis (moving from caller to callee).","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"e595922d-5f43-4100-9c4c-d05354ce7e3f","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Flexibility","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"params","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" attribute allows for complex data structures (like the dictionaries used for keyword arguments), ensuring that all argument types are preserved for resolution.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"0aeb1b93-9aab-4544-9684-7d72f88c7ea6","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[],"children":[]}]
